path.description: The path to create the page

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors

styleext.description: The file extension of the style file for the page

spec.description: Specifies if a spec file is generated

flat.description: Flag to indicate if a dir is created

selector.description: The selector to use for the page

createModule.description: Allows creating an NgModule for the component

module.description: Allows adding to an NgModule's imports or declarations

export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this component.

entryComponent.description: When true, the new component is the entry component of the declaring NgModule.
